text: Tarapara imanadarara allahara hukume jalutera bahinike parajita kare dila ebam da'uda jalutake hatya karala. Ara allaha da'udake dana karalena rajya o abhijnata. Ara take ya ca'ilena sikhalena. Allaha yadi ekajanake aparajanera dbara pratihata na karatena, tahale gota duniya bidhbasta haye yeto. Kintu bisbabasira prati allaha ekanta'i dayalu, karunamaya.
